results.name: Smallest number of integer sided squares needed to tile a 3 X n rectangle.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(3 x - 2 x^3)/(1 - x - x^3 + x^4), {x, 0, 70}], x] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Oct 01 2017 *)
